#################################################

Release Name:
Ottos.Magic.Blocks.(WildTangent.Games)-WWW

Release Type: PC Game
Game: Ottos Magic Blocks
Language: English
 
#################################################

System Requirements:
Processor: Pentium - 800MHz or better
RAM: 256MB
DirectX Version: 7.0 or above
Keyboard and Mouse: Supported
Operating System: Windows 8, Windows 7, Vista and XP
	
#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Ottos Magic Blocks_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

Teach Otto new tricks as you bound through quirky levels. Beware! The magic board is flat (unlike the earth) - so you dont want to leap lazily off the end! Go bonkers and spring towards those power-ups cuz the bad bugs are out to get you! Uncover secret levels in this Dreamland Arcade hit! Watch out for King FrixFrax every 20 levels and look for those magical blocks! Critters like Fuzzabound and Hoverbug are after you, but fun power-ups like Big Foot and Critter Zapper are there to help!

#################################################

FAQs
Q: Is this the full game?
A: Yes.

A: No.

Q: Is this multilingual?
A: No. English is the only language supported.

Q: Will this installer work on a Mac?
A: Buy me a Mac and I'll figure it out.

A: No.

Q: Will you marry me?
A: No.
